terms.text: By continuing, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old and agree to an introductory trial payment of $1 for 3 days. If you do not cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period, you will automatically be charged $99 for a quarterly subscription (3 months) and will continue to be charged every 3 months until you cancel.

items.question: What is an AI companion and how does it work?
items.answer: An AI companion is a virtual character created using artificial intelligence. You can customize their appearance and personality, and they will communicate with you through text messages, adapting to your preferences.

items.question: Can I customize the appearance and personality of the AI companion?
items.answer: Yes, you can personalize their appearance (facial features, clothing, etc.) and choose their personality and behavior to match your preferences.

items.question: How realistic is the AI companion?
items.answer: The AI companion is designed using advanced natural language processing technologies, making interactions smooth and engaging. However, they remain a virtual character.

items.question: Can I chat with an AI companion 24/7?
items.answer: Yes, the AI companion is available at any time, with no restrictions on time or place. They are always ready to chat whenever it is convenient for you.

items.question: Can I create multiple AI companions?
items.answer: Yes, you can create multiple characters and customize each one differently. This allows you to explore different personalities and interactions.

items.question: Is it safe to chat with an AI companion?
items.answer: Yes, your privacy is important to us. All conversations with the AI companion are protected and not shared with third parties. We do not store personal data without your consent.
